Ivory Tower Wizard Janssen:
Although You do not write the text of the message, a Magical Owl deliver to the destination word for word.
You don't need to worry about what the bird will lose a letter, or will fall to the hunters or the wild beasts. Amazing, isn't it?
You should know that the Owl remembers absolutely everything about what You think at the time of transmission of the message, so you need to watch your thoughts.
Perhaps, it is the only drawback. Want to try?
